Info.Title: The Lord of the Rings
Info.Writer: Chris Conkling (screenplay), Peter S. Beagle (screenplay), J.R.R. Tolkien (novels)
Info.Actors: Christopher Guard, William Squire, Michael Scholes, John Hurt
Info.Plot: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
